import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Header.css'; import logo from '../assets/images/logo.png'; // Adjust the path as necessary import { FaUserCircle, FaShoppingCart } from 'react-icons/fa'; // Importing icons from react-icons function Header({ setSearchTerm }) { return (
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="search-input" />
); } export default Header;
